title: Fractures involving multiple regions of one lower limb
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
inclusion: bilateral involvement of limbs of the same body region
Injuries by type involving two or more body regions classifiable within S00-S99
Fractures of sites classifiable to S72.-, S82.-, S92.- and T12 of one lower limb
exclusion: multiple injuries involving only one body region - see S-section
when combined with fractures of: other lower limb
when combined with fractures of: thorax, lower back and pelvis
when combined with fractures of: upper limb(s)
symptoms: fractures in multiple regions of one lower extremity can cause symptoms like pain
